00020 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }
00021 
00022 ////
00023 // Creation Routine
00024 ////
00025 CPlayGameVorticon::CPlayGameVorticon( CExeFile &ExeFile, char level,
00026     char numplayers, char difficulty,
00027     stOption *p_option,
00028     bool finale, CSavedGame &SavedGame) :
00029 CPlayGame(ExeFile, level, numplayers, difficulty, p_option),
00030 mp_ObjectAI(NULL),
00031 m_SavedGame(SavedGame),
00032 mp_HighScores(NULL),
00033 mp_HUD(NULL)
00034 {
00035  mp_Menu = NULL;
00036  mp_Finale = NULL;
00037  mp_gameoverbmp = NULL;
00038  
00039  if(!m_Player.empty())
00040   m_Player.clear();
00041 
00042  m_Player.assign(m_NumPlayers, CPlayer(m_Episode, m_Level, m_Difficulty,
00043    mp_level_completed, mp_option,
00044    m_Object, m_Map));
00045 
00046  for(int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++)
00047  {
00048   // Put some important Player properties
00049   CPlayer &thisPlayer = m_Player.at(i);
00050   thisPlayer.m_index = i;
00051   thisPlayer.setDatatoZero();
00052  }
00053 
00054  // Create completed level list
00055  memset(mp_level_completed,false,MAX_LEVELS_VORTICON*sizeof(bool));
00056 
00057  m_showPauseDialog = false;
00058 
00059  if(m_Difficulty==0)
00060   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdarkness(FADE_DARKNESS_EASY);
00061  else if(m_Difficulty==1)
00062   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdarkness(FADE_DARKNESS);
00063  else
00064   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdarkness(FADE_DARKNESS_HARD);
00065 
00066  if(finale) m_level_command = GOTO_FINALE;
00067 }
00068 
00069 // Setup all the players, when one level is started
00070 void CPlayGameVorticon::setupPlayers()
00071 {
00072  m_showKeensLeft=false;
00073  mp_KeenLeftSfc = NULL;
00074  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00075  for( ; it_player!=m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00076  for (int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++)
00077  {
00078   if( m_Level == WORLD_MAP_LEVEL )
00079   {
00080    it_player->m_playingmode = CPlayer::WORLDMAP;
00081    m_showKeensLeft |= ( it_player->pdie == PDIE_DEAD );
00082    if(it_player->godmode) it_player->solid = false;
00083   }
00084   else
00085   {
00086    it_player->m_playingmode = CPlayer::LEVELPLAY;
00087    it_player->sprite = PSTANDFRAME;
00088    it_player->solid=true;
00089   }
00090   it_player->pdie = PDIE_NODIE;
00091   
00092   // Calibrate Player to the right position, so it won't fall when level starts
00093   CSprite &sprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(PSTANDFRAME);
00094   it_player->w = sprite.getWidth()<<STC;
00095   it_player->h = sprite.getHeight()<<STC;
00096   it_player->m_level = m_Level;
00097   m_Map.m_Dark = false;
00098   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdark(m_Map.m_Dark);
00099   
00100   // Set the pointers to the map and object data
00101   it_player->setMapData(&m_Map);
00102   it_player->exists = true;
00103   if(it_player->m_playingmode == CPlayer::WORLDMAP) it_player->solid=!(it_player->godmode);
00104  }
00105 
00106  stInventory &inventory = m_Player.at(0).inventory;
00107 
00108  if(mp_HUD) delete mp_HUD;
00109  mp_HUD = new CHUD(inventory.score, inventory.lives, inventory.charges);
00110 }
00111 
00112 bool CPlayGameVorticon::init()
00113 {
00114  // Create an empty map
00115  m_Map.setScrollSurface(g_pVideoDriver->getScrollSurface());
00116 
00117  CMapLoader MapLoader( &m_Map, &m_Player );
00118  MapLoader.m_checkpointset = m_checkpointset;
00119  MapLoader.mp_objvect = &m_Object;
00120 
00121  m_Map.m_Difficulty = m_Difficulty;
00122 
00123  // load level map
00124  if( !MapLoader.load( m_Episode, m_Level, m_Gamepath ) ) return false;
00125 
00126  //// If those worked fine, continue the initialization
00127  // draw level map
00128  m_Map.drawAll();
00129 
00130  // Now Scroll to the position of the player and center him
00131  m_Map.gotoPos( 32, 64 ); // Assure that the edges are never seen
00132 
00133  setupPlayers();
00134 
00135  // Well, all players are living because they were newly spawn.
00136  g_pTimer->ResetSecondsTimer();
00137 
00138  g_pInput->flushAll();
00139  
00140  // Initialize the AI
00141  mp_ObjectAI = new CObjectAI(&m_Map, m_Object, m_Player, mp_option,
00142         m_NumPlayers, m_Episode, m_Level,
00143         m_Difficulty, m_Map.m_Dark);
00144 
00145  // Check if Player meets the conditions to show a cutscene. This also happens, when finale of episode has reached
00146  verifyFinales();
00147 
00148  // When Level starts it's never dark!
00149  g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdark(false);
00150 
00151  if(m_level_command == GOTO_FINALE)
00152   createFinale();
00153  else
00154   if(m_showKeensLeft) g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_KEENSLEFT, PLAY_NOW);
00155 
00156  // In the case that we are in Episode 3 last Level, show Mortimer Messages
00157  if( m_Episode == 3 && m_Level == 16 )
00158  {
00159   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_MORTIMER"),false, true));
00160   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_MORTIMER2"),false, true));
00161   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_MORTIMER3"),false, true));
00162   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_MORTIMER4"),false, true));
00163   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_MORTIMER5"),false, true));
00164   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_MORTIMER6"),false, true));
00165   g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_MORTIMER, PLAY_FORCE);
00166  }
00167 
00168  return true;
00169 }
00170 
00171 ////
00172 // Process Routine
00173 ////
00174 void CPlayGameVorticon::process()
00175 {
00176  // Check for fading processes if necessary
00177  if(g_pGfxEngine->Palette.in_progress())
00178   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.applyFade();
00179 
00180  if(mp_HighScores) // Are we requesting Highscores
00181  {
00182   mp_HighScores->process();
00183 
00184   // Blit the background
00185   g_pVideoDriver->blitScrollSurface();
00186 
00187   if(mp_HighScores->destroyed())
00188   {
00189    SAFE_DELETE(mp_HighScores);
00190    m_endgame = true;
00191   }
00192  }
00193  else // No, we are in the middle of the game
00194  {
00195   // If the menu is open process it!
00196   if(mp_Menu)
00197   {
00198    if( mp_Menu->mustClose() || mp_Menu->getExitEvent() ||
00199      mp_Menu->mustEndGame() || mp_Menu->mustStartGame() )
00200    {
00201     if( mp_Menu->getExitEvent() )
00202      m_exitgame = true;
00203     else if( mp_Menu->mustEndGame() )
00204      m_endgame = true;
00205     else if( mp_Menu->mustStartGame() )
00206     {
00207      m_NumPlayers = mp_Menu->getNumPlayers();
00208      m_Difficulty = mp_Menu->getDifficulty();
00209      m_startgame = true;
00210     }
00211 
00212     mp_Menu->cleanup();
00213     SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00214     m_hideobjects = false;
00215    }
00216    else
00217    {
00218     mp_Menu->processSpecific();
00219 
00220     if(m_restartVideo) // Happens when in Game resolution was changed!
00221     {
00222      mp_Menu->cleanup();
00223      SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00224      m_Map.setScrollSurface(g_pVideoDriver->getScrollSurface());
00225      SDL_Rect gamerect = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00226      m_Map.m_maxscrollx = (m_Map.m_width<<4) - gamerect.w - 36;
00227      m_Map.m_maxscrolly = (m_Map.m_height<<4) - gamerect.h - 36;
00228      //for( int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++ )
00229       /*while(*/m_Player[0].scrollTriggers()/*)*/;
00230      m_Map.drawAll();
00231      m_restartVideo = false;
00232     }
00233 
00234     // Does the player want to load/save a game?
00235     if(m_SavedGame.getCommand() == CSavedGame::SAVE)
00236      saveGameState();
00237     else if(m_SavedGame.getCommand() == CSavedGame::LOAD)
00238      loadGameState();
00239    }
00240   }
00241   else if(!m_paused && m_MessageBoxes.empty()) // Game is not paused
00242   {
00243    if (!mp_Finale) // Hasn't the game yet been finished?
00244    {
00245     // Perform AIs
00246     mp_ObjectAI->process();
00247 
00248     /// The following functions must be worldmap dependent
00249     if( m_Level == WORLD_MAP_LEVEL )
00250     {
00251      processOnWorldMap();
00252     }
00253     else
00254     {
00255      processInLevel();
00256     }
00257 
00258     // Does one of the players need to pause the game?
00259     for( int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++ )
00260     {
00261      // Did he open the status screen?
00262      if(m_Player[i].m_showStatusScreen)
00263       m_paused = true; // this is processed in processPauseDialogs!
00264 
00265      // Handle the Scrolling here!
00266      m_Player[0].scrollTriggers();
00267     }
00268    }
00269    else // In this case the Game has been finished, goto to the cutscenes
00270    {
00271     mp_Finale->process();
00272 
00273     if(mp_Finale->getHasFinished())
00274     {
00275      SAFE_DELETE(mp_Finale);
00276 
00277      if(!m_gameover)
00278      {
00279       mp_HighScores = new CHighScores(m_Episode, m_Gamepath, true);
00280       collectHighScoreInfo();
00281      }
00282     }
00283    }
00284   }
00285   else // In this case the game is paused
00286   {
00287    // Finally draw Dialogs like status screen, game paused, etc.
00288    processPauseDialogs();
00289   }
00290 
00291 
00292   // Do the Render Routine here!
00293   drawAllElements();
00294 
00295   /// For debuging the max fall speed !!!!!!!!!!!!! Must be removed soon
00296   /*int &maxfallspeed = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings().max_fallspeed;
00297   if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KA))
00298    maxfallspeed++;
00299   if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KB))
00300    maxfallspeed--;
00301   printf("maxfallspeed = %d\n",maxfallspeed);*/
00302 
00303 
00304   // Check if we are in gameover mode. If yes, than show the bitmaps and block the FKeys().
00305   // Only confirmation button is allowes
00306   if(m_gameover && !mp_Finale) // game over mode
00307   {
00308    if(mp_gameoverbmp != NULL)
00309    {
00310     mp_gameoverbmp->process();
00311 
00312     if( g_pInput->getPressedKey(KENTER) || g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() )
00313     {
00314      mp_HighScores = new CHighScores(m_Episode, m_Gamepath, true);
00315 
00316      collectHighScoreInfo();
00317     }
00318    }
00319    else // Bitmap must first be created
00320    {
00321     CBitmap *pBitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("GAMEOVER");
00322     g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_GAME_OVER, PLAY_NOW);
00323     mp_gameoverbmp = new CEGABitmap(&m_Map , g_pVideoDriver->getBlitSurface(), pBitmap);
00324     mp_gameoverbmp->setScrPos( 160-(pBitmap->getWidth()/2), 100-(pBitmap->getHeight()/2) );
00325    }
00326   }
00327   else // No game over
00328   {
00329    // Handle special functional keys for paused game, F1 Help, god mode, all items, etc.
00330    handleFKeys();
00331   }
00332 
00333   if (g_pVideoDriver->showfps)
00334   {
00335    SDL_Surface *sfc = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00336    std::string tempbuf;
00337 #ifdef DEBUG
00338    tempbuf = "FPS: " + itoa(g_pTimer->getFramesPerSec()) +
00339         "; x = " + itoa(m_Player[0].getXPosition()) + " ; y = " + itoa(m_Player[0].getYPosition());
00340 #else
00341    tempbuf = "FPS: " + itoa(g_pTimer->getFramesPerSec());
00342 #endif
00343    g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc,tempbuf,320-(tempbuf.size()<<3)-1, true);
00344 
00345   }
00346 
00347   // Open the Main Menu if ESC Key pressed and mp_Menu not opened
00348   if(!mp_Menu && !mp_Finale && g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_QUIT))
00349   { // Open the menu
00350    mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( ACTIVE, m_ExeFile, m_Map, m_SavedGame, mp_option, m_restartVideo, m_hideobjects );
00351   }
00352  }
00353 }
00354 
00355 
00356 void CPlayGameVorticon::handleFKeys()
00357 {
00358  int i;
00359  
00360  // CTSpace Cheat
00361     if (g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KC) &&
00362   g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KT) &&
00363   g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KSPACE))
00364  {
00365   g_pInput->flushAll();
00366   for(i=0;i<m_NumPlayers;i++)
00367   {
00368    m_Player[i].pfiring = false;
00369    if (m_Player[i].m_playingmode)
00370    {
00371     CPhysicsSettings &Phy = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00372 
00373     if(Phy.misc.ctspace_keys)
00374     {
00375      m_Player[i].give_keycard(DOOR_YELLOW);
00376      m_Player[i].give_keycard(DOOR_RED);
00377      m_Player[i].give_keycard(DOOR_GREEN);
00378      m_Player[i].give_keycard(DOOR_BLUE);
00379     }
00380     else
00381     {
00382      m_Player[i].take_keycard(DOOR_YELLOW);
00383      m_Player[i].take_keycard(DOOR_RED);
00384      m_Player[i].take_keycard(DOOR_GREEN);
00385      m_Player[i].take_keycard(DOOR_BLUE);
00386     }
00387     
00388     m_Player[i].inventory.charges = Phy.misc.ctspace_ammo;
00389     m_Player[i].inventory.HasPogo = true;
00390     m_Player[i].inventory.lives += 5;
00391 
00392     std::string Text = g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("CTSPACECHEAT");
00393      
00394     m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(Text));
00395     m_paused = true;
00396    }
00397   }
00398   g_pVideoDriver->AddConsoleMsg("All items cheat");
00399  }
00400  
00401     // GOD cheat -- toggle god mode
00402     if ( g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KG) && g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KO) && g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KD) )
00403     {
00404      std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00405      for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++)
00406      {
00407       it_player->godmode ^= 1;
00408       // If player on map, make disable the solid property of the players
00409       if(m_Level == 80)
00410        it_player->solid = !it_player->godmode;
00411       it_player->performCollisions();
00412      }
00413 
00414      g_pVideoDriver->DeleteConsoleMsgs();
00415      if (m_Player[0].godmode)
00416       g_pVideoDriver->AddConsoleMsg("God mode ON");
00417      else
00418       g_pVideoDriver->AddConsoleMsg("God mode OFF");
00419 
00420      g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_GUN_CLICK, PLAY_FORCE);
00421 
00422      // Show a message like in the original game
00423   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(m_Player[0].godmode ? g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("GODMODEON") : g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("GODMODEOFF")));
00424      m_paused = true;
00425      g_pInput->flushKeys();
00426     }
00427 
00428     /*if (g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KTAB)) // noclip/revive
00429     {
00430      for(i=0;i<m_NumPlayers;i++)
00431      {
00432       // resurrect any dead players. the rest of the KTAB magic is
00433       // scattered throughout the various functions.
00434       if (m_Player[i].pdie)
00435       {
00436        m_Player[i].pdie = PDIE_NODIE;
00437        m_Player[i].moveUp(8<<CSF);
00438       }
00439 
00440       m_Player[i].pfrozentime = 0;
00441      }
00442     }*/
00443 
00444  if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KP) && m_MessageBoxes.empty())
00445  {
00446   g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_GUN_CLICK, PLAY_FORCE);
00447   m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox("Game Paused"));
00448  }
00449 
00450  if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KF1))
00451  {
00452   // Show the typical F1 Help
00453   // Open the menu
00454   //mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( ACTIVE, m_Gamepath, m_Episode, m_Map, m_SavedGame, mp_option );
00455   //SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00456   //mp_Menu = new CHelpMenuVorticon(DLG_THEME_VORTICON);
00457   //mp_Menu->init(F1);
00458  }
00459  
00460  /*if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KF2))
00461  {
00462   // Debug Menu
00463   // Open the menu
00464   mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( ACTIVE, m_Gamepath, m_Episode, m_Map, m_SavedGame, mp_option );
00465   mp_Menu->init(DEBUG);
00466  }*/
00467 
00468     // F2 - Sound Menu
00469     if (g_pInput->getPressedKey(KF2))
00470     {
00471   mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( ACTIVE, m_ExeFile, m_Map,
00472          m_SavedGame, mp_option, m_restartVideo, m_hideobjects );
00473   mp_Menu->init(AUDIO);
00474     }
00475     // F3 - Controls Menu
00476     else if (g_pInput->getPressedKey(KF3))
00477     {
00478   mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( ACTIVE, m_ExeFile, m_Map,
00479          m_SavedGame, mp_option, m_restartVideo, m_hideobjects );
00480   mp_Menu->init(CONTROLS);
00481     }
00482     // F5 - save game
00483     else if (g_pInput->getPressedKey(KF5))
00484     {
00485   mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( ACTIVE, m_ExeFile, m_Map,
00486          m_SavedGame, mp_option, m_restartVideo, m_hideobjects );
00487   mp_Menu->init(SAVE);
00488     }
00489 
00490 }
00491 
00492 // The Ending and mortimer cutscenes for example
00493 void CPlayGameVorticon::verifyFinales()
00494 {
00495  // first we need to know which Episode we were on
00496  if(m_Episode == 1)
00497  {
00498   bool hasBattery, hasWiskey, hasJoystick, hasVaccum;
00499   hasBattery = hasWiskey = hasJoystick = hasVaccum = false;
00500 
00501   // Check if one of the Players has the items
00502   for( int i=0 ;i < m_NumPlayers ; i++)
00503   {
00504    hasBattery |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasBattery;
00505    hasWiskey |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasWiskey;
00506    hasJoystick |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasJoystick;
00507    hasVaccum |= m_Player[i].inventory.HasVacuum;
00508   }
00509 
00510   // If they have have the items, we can go home
00511   if(hasBattery && hasWiskey && hasJoystick && hasVaccum)
00512    createFinale();
00513  }
00514  else if(m_Episode == 2)
00515  {
00516   bool allCitiesSaved;
00517   allCitiesSaved = mp_level_completed[4];
00518   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[6];
00519   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[7];
00520   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[9];
00521   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[11];
00522   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[13];
00523   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[15];
00524   allCitiesSaved &= mp_level_completed[16];
00525 
00526   if(allCitiesSaved)
00527    createFinale();
00528  }
00529  else if(m_Episode == 3)
00530  {
00531   if(mp_level_completed[16] == true) // If this level is completed, Mortimer has been killed!
00532    createFinale();
00533  }
00534 }
00535 
00536 void CPlayGameVorticon::createFinale()
00537 {
00538  if(m_Episode == 1)
00539  {
00540   mp_Finale = new CEndingEp1(m_Map, m_Player, m_hideobjects);
00541  }
00542  else if(m_Episode == 2)
00543  {
00544   mp_Finale = new CEndingEp2(m_Map, m_Player);
00545  }
00546  else if(m_Episode == 3)
00547  {
00548   mp_Finale = new CEndingEp3(m_Map, m_Player);
00549  }
00550 }
00551 
00552 void CPlayGameVorticon::teleportPlayerFromLevel(CPlayer &player, int origx, int origy)
00553 {
00554  int destx, desty;
00555 
00556  CTeleporter *teleporter = new CTeleporter(&m_Map, m_Player, origx, origy);
00557  player.beingteleported = true;
00558  player.solid = false;
00559  destx = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTeleporterTableAt(5).x;
00560  desty = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTeleporterTableAt(5).y;
00561  teleporter->solid = false;
00562  teleporter->direction = TELEPORTING_SCROLL;
00563  teleporter->destx = destx>>TILE_S;
00564  teleporter->desty = desty>>TILE_S;
00565  teleporter->whichplayer = player.m_index;
00566  m_Object.push_back(teleporter);
00567 }
00568 
00569 void CPlayGameVorticon::collectHighScoreInfo()
00570 {
00571  if(m_Episode == 1)
00572  {
00573   bool extra[4];
00574 
00575   extra[0] = m_Player[0].inventory.HasJoystick;
00576   extra[1] = m_Player[0].inventory.HasBattery;
00577   extra[2] = m_Player[0].inventory.HasVacuum;
00578   extra[3] = m_Player[0].inventory.HasWiskey;
00579 
00580   mp_HighScores->writeEP1HighScore(m_Player[0].inventory.score, extra);
00581  }
00582  else if(m_Episode == 2)
00583  {
00584   // episode 2: game is won when all cities are saved
00585   int saved_cities=0;
00586   if (mp_level_completed[4]) saved_cities++;
00587   if (mp_level_completed[6]) saved_cities++;
00588   if (mp_level_completed[7]) saved_cities++;
00589   if (mp_level_completed[13]) saved_cities++;
00590   if (mp_level_completed[11]) saved_cities++;
00591   if (mp_level_completed[9]) saved_cities++;
00592   if (mp_level_completed[15]) saved_cities++;
00593   if (mp_level_completed[16]) saved_cities++;
00594 
00595   mp_HighScores->writeEP2HighScore(m_Player[0].inventory.score, saved_cities);
00596  }
00597  else
00598   mp_HighScores->writeHighScoreCommon(m_Player[0].inventory.score);
00599 }
00600 
00601 // This function draws the objects that need to be seen on the screen
00602 void CPlayGameVorticon::drawObjects()
00603 {
00604  if(m_hideobjects) return;
00605 
00606  SDL_Rect gameres = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00607  
00608  std::vector<CObject*>::iterator it_obj = m_Object.begin();
00609  for(; it_obj!=m_Object.end() ; it_obj++)
00610  {
00611   if(!(*it_obj)->dontdraw)
00612    (*it_obj)->draw();
00613  }
00614 
00615  // We draw the Player as last, because we want to see him in front of the other objects
00616  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00617  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_end = ( m_Level!=WORLD_MAP_LEVEL) ? m_Player.end() : m_Player.begin()+1;
00618  for (; it_player != it_end ; it_player++)
00619  {
00620   if(!it_player->beingteleported)
00621    it_player->draw();
00622  }
00623 
00624 }
00625 
00626 void CPlayGameVorticon::drawAllElements()
00627 {
00628  // Animate the tiles of the map
00629  m_Map.animateAllTiles();
00630 
00631  // Blit the background
00632  g_pVideoDriver->blitScrollSurface();
00633 
00634  // Draw all objects to the screen
00635  drawObjects();
00636 
00637  // Draw masked tiles here!
00638  m_Map.drawForegroundTiles();
00639 
00640  if(mp_option[OPT_HUD].value && !mp_Finale)
00641  { // Draw the HUD
00642   mp_HUD->render();
00643  }
00644 
00645 }
00646 ////
00647 // Cleanup Routine
00648 ////
00649 void CPlayGameVorticon::cleanup()
00650 {
00651  SAFE_DELETE(mp_ObjectAI);
00652  std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = m_Object.begin();
00653  for( ; obj != m_Object.end() ; obj++ )
00654   delete (*obj);
00655  m_Object.clear();
00656 }
00657 
00658 CPlayGameVorticon::~CPlayGameVorticon() {
00659  m_Player.clear();
00660  if(mp_Finale) delete mp_Finale;
00661  mp_Finale = NULL;
00662  if(mp_gameoverbmp) delete mp_gameoverbmp;
00663  mp_gameoverbmp = NULL;
00664  SAFE_DELETE(mp_ObjectAI);
00665  SAFE_DELETE(mp_HUD);
00666 }
